text_query: Show all invoices that were made during Christmas Eve, Chrsitmas Day, Boxing Day, New Year's Even, New Years' day
Find the top 3 artists by total albums
expected_sql: SELECT AR.name, COUNT(AR.name) as TotalAlbums FROM album AL INNER JOIN artist AR ON AL.artist_id = AR.artist_id GROUP BY AR.name ORDER BY TotalAlbums DESC LIMIT 3;

text_query: list classic composers and their corresponding average track length
expected_sql: SELECT T.composer, AVG(T.milliseconds) from track T LEFT JOIN genre G on T.genre_id = G.genre_id where G.name like '%Classic%' GROUP BY T.composer;

text_query: list all the countries our customers are from
What is the total invoice amount by country?
expected_sql: SELECT billing_country, SUM(total) from invoice GROUP BY billing_country;
SELECT CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS name from employee where reports_to in (select employee_id from employee where first_name='Andrew' and last_name='Adams')

text_query: List all the tracks under each playlist
expected_sql: SELECT P.name as playlistName, T.name as trackName FROM playlist_track PT left join playlist P on PT.playlist_id=P.playlist_id left join track T on PT.track_id = T.track_id order by playlistname;
